channel.title: Need help with mod/admin
channel.description: ok im using comipler to run server, and i go under admin put names save..dont work, i change rights save and they go back to 0...sum1 help..also wen i runserver off runserver.bat does not work

item.title: Need help with mod/admin
item.dc:creator: @redneck97 redneck97
item.description:
@redneck97 wrote:

ok first make shure the person logs off for at least 5 min depending on how fast u are
go to your server source
charcters
find the player name and click on it
now u will see

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3250 character-posy = 3435 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = 5.161.109.249 character-lastlogin = 20070406 character-energy = 2 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 121
change

character-rights = 0

1= mod 2=admin 3= owner
ok now save that and you should be good to go

Read full topic
